snippet.title: Game Trailer, Solar Flux / Solar Flux Pocket - Release Trailer Nov 2013
snippet.description:
http://www.solarfluxgame.com
Solar Flux is a unique space puzzle game. Travel across the universe and save dying suns from extinction by collecting and delivering fragments of plasma, while carefully navigating around the various pitfalls in each Galaxy. Available now for iPad, PC, Android and iPhone!

Solar Flux, Solar Flux HD, Solar Flux Pocket - Release Trailer - by Firebrand Games.
Solar Flux - Released for PC via Steam - http://store.steampowered.com/app/251910/
Solar Flux HD - Released for iPad - http://goo.gl/frZvR5 and Android Tablets - 
Solar Flux Pocket - Released for iPhone - https://itunes.apple.com/gb/app/solar-flux-pocket/id722445283?mt=8 and Android Phones - 

For more information on Solar Flux:

* Visit the official website: http://solarfluxgame.com/
* Follow us on G+: https://plus.google.com/+Solarfluxgame
* Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/SolarFluxHD
* Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/SolarFluxGame
* Follow us on IndieDB: http://www.indiedb.com/games/solar-flux-hd

To keep up to date with all things Firebrand Games:

* Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/FirebrandGames
* Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/firebrandgames
* Circle us on Google+: http://goo.gl/Yg2aLA
* Subscribe to our YouTube Channel: http://www.youtube.com/user/FirebrandGamesMedia

Affiliates:
Kennedy Space Center Visitor Complex
http://kennedyspacecenter.com/

Space Coast Office of Tourism
http://www.visitspacecoast.com/
